title: Jungler
body:
So, I love to play Jungler. There was a time when I used to main Zed but with his buffs he was obverplayed and I kinda lost my fun in him. So I started to Jungle. Now I have 6300 IP and need a Jungler with the following qualities (There is no jungler with all of them and so just make suggestions):
- Dash, best if related to area not enemy or ally
- CC (Best stun or knockback)
- Outplay
- Manaless
- OK clear
- Not just currently OP but consistently strong
- Some kind of AOE Damage for teamfights
- Strong Lategame (This one is a bit more important)
Please just recommend, don't care if the champion matches all my criteria or not.
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
